title: A high-loading catalyst of highly dispersed nickel species on acid-treated mesoporous clay layers for efficient CO and CO2 methanation
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01179A, Paper
Feifei Li, Junbo Zhang, Yufu Liu, Guanjun Gao, Yi He, Xuzhuang Yang
The catalyst, consisting of nickel-amino acid framework nanocrystals on acid modified clay layers, exhibited excellent activity and stability in CO and CO2 methanations due to its high content of dispersed Ni species.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
